articles.title: FM Spokesman on US Describing "Cheonan" Case as "Violation of AA"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on US Describing "Cheonan" Case as "Violation of AA"
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry spokesman gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on July 6 as regards the fact that the U.S. is describing the "Cheonan" incident as an "act of violating the Korean Armistice Agreement: 
					 The U.S. has placed the south Korean authorities at the head in its persistent demand that the "Cheonan" incident be discussed at the "Military Armistice Commission", alleging that this incident constitutes the "violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement."  
					
					 It is a historical fact known to the world that the Korean Armistice Agreement, from the moment of its signature, became subject to a systematic violation and abrogation by the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. systematically abrogated essential elements of the Korean Armistice Agreement; It violated Paragraph 60 of the Armistice Agreement stipulating that a political conference of a higher level be held to settle through negotiation the questions of the withdrawal of all foreign forces from Korea and the peaceful settlement of the Korean question. It also went on to violate Paragraph 13 of the AA banning the introduction of equipment for military operation from outside of Korea. 
					
					 In 1991, the U.S. had made a unilateral decision of designating a puppet army "general" of south Korea, which is neither party to the armistice agreement nor a member of the "United Nations Command", as the senior member of the "UNC" side to the "MAC" and eluded its responsibility from that seat, thus completely paralyzing the MAC.
					
					 The U.S. had already destroyed by itself the Armistice Agreement and its mechanism. It does not stand to reason that the US is now trying to take them into the "Cheonan" incident. 
					
					 Herein lies an ulterior aim sought by the U.S. 
					
					 As time goes by, growing suspicion about the "results of investigation" announced by the south Korean authorities continues to spread across the world whereas the international community is expressing greater sympathy with our proposal to send an inspection team.  
					
					 Being cornered, the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities are playing cheap tricks with the issue of consultation forum in an attempt to block the involvement of our inspection team and blur the truth behind their fabricated plot.  
					
					 The U.S. wanted to take the advantage of the fact that we do not recognize the "MAC" and came up with the idea of "discussion at the MAC"; however, it is a miscalculation.
					
					 The U.S. argues that the incident can be discussed at the "MAC" because there is a "precedent of DPRK-U.S. general-level talks" dealing with violations of the Armistice Agreement.  
					
					 However, the truth behind the "Cheonan incident" has not been unveiled yet; hence, as of this moment, we cannot even talk about the violation of the Armistice Agreement.  
					
					 We have already clarified our position as regards this matter; an inspection team of the National Defence Commission must be sent to uncover the truth of the incident; working-level contacts for north-south high-level military talks must be made to this end.
					
					  The United Nations Security Council should abide by the principle of objectivity and impartiality so as to distinguish truth from falsehood and take heed of our proposal aimed at giving priority to the work of getting to the bottom of the incident.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Meets Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, met and had a conversation with Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of An Tong Su
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of An Tong Su
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of DPRK Hero An Tong Su at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on Tuesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of his death in action.
					 Seen there was a wreath from Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Hwang Sun Hui, curator of the Korean Revolution Museum, officers and men of the KPA and officials concerned. 
					
					 Also on hand were Jong Il Sim, wife of An Tong Su, and a member of the bereaved family who are residing in Russia.
					
					 Placed before the grave were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, a unit of the KPA, the Korean Revolution Museum and the Bureau of Service for Overseas Compatriots and bunches of flowers.
					
					 The participants paid a silent tribute to the memory of An who died a heroic death in the battlefield of the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Dance Company
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Dance Company
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company of Russia.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on July 5 by Director Elena Scherbakova who is leading the dance company.

articles.title: Scientists Give Assistance to School Education
articles.content:
Scientists Give Assistance to School Education
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Research Institute of Fish Farming under the State Academy of Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has rendered assistance to schools in education.    
					 Recently, scientists of the institute, busy as they were with their researches, found time to make many fish specimens and sent them to some 20 secondary schools in Pyongyang. 
					
					 They, after acquainting themselves with species of fishes taught at secondary school, made specimens of freshwater fishes, sea fishes and shellfishes. 
					
					 They collected fishes in rivers, reservoirs and seas and solved some scientific and technical problems arising in improving the specimens in morphological and pedagogical way.
					
					 The specimens total thousands of several dozen species including carp, rainbow trout, dace and swellfish. 
					
					 Yun Kyong Su, principal of Pyongyang Munsin Secondary School, which received specimens of 45 species, told KCNA that all the teachers and students of the school were grateful to the scientists for their sincere assistance.

articles.title: New Book Off Press
articles.content:
New Book Off Press
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out the book "Collection of Materials on Revolutionary History of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" (Vol. 11) compiled by the Party History Institute of the WPK Central Committee.
					 The book deals with the materials on the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung from July of Juche 26 (1937) to November of Juche 27 (1938).
					
					 The first part of the book carries what Kim Il Sung said recollecting the period when he was leading the struggle to bring about a new surge in the overall Korean revolution by hastening the preparations for all-people resistance and augmenting the military and political might of the revolutionary ranks while conducting the operation to harass the enemy rear to cope with the situation created after the outbreak of the Sino-Japanese war.
					
					 The second part of the book contains reminiscences of anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters telling about the greatness of the President they grasped in their practical struggles, covering the thorny path of the revolution true to his leadership. 
					
					 It also contains materials dealing with the extraordinary personality of the President as a great man who made long journeys of anti-Japanese bloody battles to realize the historic cause of Korea's liberation and his outstanding commanding art and the spirit of devotedly defending the leader displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters.
					
					 Its third part deals with materials published by the authorities of the Japanese imperialists, confidential documents of the puppet Manchukou and articles carried by publications at home and abroad at that time on the battles commanded by the President and the activities of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and the revolutionary organizations including party organizations and the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland. 
					
					 The book has an appendix which introduces publications dealing with the anti-Japanese patriotic struggle of the Korean people which mounted under the influence of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and documents on the colonial plunder and the moves to exterminate the Korean nation intensified by the Japanese imperialists and their "punitive operations" against the Korean People's Revolutionary Army in that time.

articles.title: Mt. Paektu in Korea
articles.content:
Mt. Paektu in Korea
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Mt. Paektu is standing in the northern part of Korea.
					Rising 2,750 meters above sea level, it has wonderful features.
					
					 In a distant view its ridge looks long and even. But when you look up at the mountain near the Paektu Bridge, it looks steep and high with many sublime peaks and rocks.
					
					 On the mountain ridge, you can see the majestic mountainscape, fantastic rocks of myriad-shaped peaks, a deep crater surrounded by steep cliffs and its spectacular lake.
					
					 The crater consists of small basins and cliffs, reminding one of magnolia, the national flower of Korea.
					
					 Lake Chon looks like human heart. Water surface rises some 1.6 meters up and down in a year.
					
					 The lakebed is of the shape of dish. The lake contains water of over 1.9 billion cube meters. 
					
					 It slopes 10-50 degrees down to the 350-meter-deep centre of the lakebed.
					
					 The mud-layer centre of the lakebed slopes 5-10 minutes on the  average, about 15 degrees at maximum.

articles.title: US Accused of Planning to Bring Nuclear-powered Carrier to West Sea
articles.content:
US Accused of Planning to Bring Nuclear-powered Carrier to West Sea
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- It is foolish for the United States to frighten the DPRK with its aircraft carrier. The army and people of the DPRK who have bolstered up their war deterrent in every way will mobilize all their potentials and demonstrate the might of Songun Korea, should the enemies dare ignite a war. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday warns this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The reckless military moves stepped up by the U.S. around the Korean Peninsula timed to coincide with the lapse of six decades since the outbreak of the Korean War can never be overlooked, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' intention to bring their nuclear-powered carrier to the West Sea of Korea indicates that they are using the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking as a golden opportunity to demonstrate their military presence and might. 
					
					 The U.S. projected war maneuvers in the waters of the West Sea of Korea are not just aimed at demonstrating their might. 
					
					 They advertise the joint maneuvers are aimed at coping with "infiltration" of DPRK submarines but they pursue an aim to militarily pressurize and contain other powers. 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose circles are asserting that the "George Washington" will stage its activities independent of the projected exercises and remain there even after they are over. This indicates that they are using the "Cheonan" case as an opportunity for beefing forces in Northeast Asia.  
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in the projected war maneuvers is to establish the sphere of military domination in Northeast Asia and put it under its control. 
					
					 The U.S. is, however, miscalculating. The Asian countries will not remain passive onlookers to the U.S. imperialists' moves to hold military hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to drop their day-dream of putting other countries under its control and dominating the world through highhanded military actions.

articles.title: US Interference Biggest Hurdle in National Reunification
articles.content:
US Interference Biggest Hurdle in National Reunification 
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the biggest hurdle in the way of the Korean nation's grand march to achieve national reunification by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					Branding the U.S. as the arch criminal who divided the Korean nation and is standing in the way of its reunification, the article goes on to say:
					
					 The U.S. has violated the national dignity and sovereignty of the south Korean people, stamped out democracy and egged the puppet group on to confrontation with fellow countrymen and moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, becoming a heinous enemy of the Korean nation and the primary target of grudge and resentment. The U.S. warlike circles orchestrated such hideous farce as the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking in collusion with south Korean puppet group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. This was full revelation of their dangerous scenario to stem the trend of the June 15 era, disturb peace on the Korean Peninsula and, furthermore, provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK come what may. 
					
					 Without putting an end to the U.S. imperialists' presence in south Korea, their hostile policy towards the DPRK and their interference in the affairs of the Korean nation it is absolutely impossible to independently settle the issue of the nation, the issue of national reunification in line with the desire and interests of the nation. This is the lesson taught by the 60 odd year-long history of national division.
					
					 All Koreans should wage a nationwide struggle against the foreign forces' domination and interference to remove the root cause of throwing obstacles to national unity and reunification and force the U.S. forces to quit south Korea and thus deprive the U.S. of any pretext to meddle in the issue of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government recently decided to enact a "law to provide special benefits" to ex-POWs detained in Siberia.
					 Under this law "special benefits" will be provided to ex-Japanese POWs detained in Siberia of the former Soviet Union and other places after the Second World War. 
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 Japan is busy enacting the law to pay "special benefits" to the above-said survivors, while persistently shunning apology and reparation for such hideous crimes against humanity as sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. This attitude of Japan once again lays bare its brazen-faced nature and moral vulgarity. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists forcibly took away and kidnapped more than 8.4 million Koreans in the past to force them to serve as cannon fodder for a war of aggression or do mediaeval slave labor in coal mines, construction sites of military facilities and other places. Then they massacred many of them under the pretext of "keeping secrets".
					
					  The survivors of the above-said sexual slavery said with bitter resentment that they could not get to sleep at the thought of what they experienced in the past, adding they could not die, their eyes closed, before having their grudge settled. 
					
					  Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries are busy paying compensation to their compatriots, turning a deaf ear to the voices of those survivors. This is an unpardonable insult to the Korean people who suffered horrible disasters at the hands of the Japanese imperialists and a mockery of justice.
					
					 Japan owes too much to the Korean nation to count. It is, therefore, a historic responsibility and a legal and moral duty for Japan to make an apology and reparation for the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					
					 Those countries which plunged humankind into disasters of the Second World War are now turning over a new leaf for peace after breaking with their past history. Japan would be well advised to face up to the trend of the present times and opt for settling its past crimes as early as possible.

articles.title: Investigation into "Joint Investigation Team" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Investigation into "Joint Investigation Team" Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The media verification committee for probing the truth about the warship "Cheonan", made up of three media organizations including the Journalist Association of south Korea, on July 2 made public a document titled "Refutation of answer given by joint investigation team."
					 The document said that the media verification committee confirmed in more than 40 days of its activities most of the fact that the "joint investigation team" made errors in its analysis and falsified facts.  
					
					 The committee refuted what the "investigation team" briefed on the warship sinking case on June 29.
					
					 It said that the committee also confirmed that the "investigation team" twisted the testimonies made by soldiers as to the issue of column of water and told lies about the transformed propeller. 
					
					 The committee held that the "investigation team" should be held accountable for the false testimonies in which the "investigation team" claimed at first the torpedo design was contained in the so-called brochure but later asserted it was found on a CD and the like. 
					
					 Stating that since the felt-tip pen with which "No. 1" was written is in wide use worldwide, it is "meaningless to use it for characterizing a state," the committee stressed: The above-said investigation team should not be allowed to conduct any investigation but should become its target. There should be inspection of the state administration to probe the truth behind the course of the investigation made by the team and the overall results of its investigation.

articles.title: Netherlands' Will to Boost Cooperation with DPRK Expressed
articles.content:
Netherlands' Will to Boost Cooperation with DPRK Expressed
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The Netherlands hopes that its relations with the DPRK would develop on good terms and cooperation be achieved in various fields.
					 Beatrix, queen of the Netherlands, said this on June 30 when receiving credentials from the DPRK ambassador to her country. 
					
					 The queen wished the Korean people big success in their drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The Netherlands regards it as important for durable peace of the Korean Peninsula to conclude a peace treaty, she said.

articles.title: Statue of First President of DR Congo Erected
articles.content:
Statue of First President of DR Congo Erected
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- The statue of Kasavubu, the first president of the Democratic Republic of Congo, was erected with the help of the DPRK. 
					 A ceremony of unveiling the statue took place in Kinshasa on June 29 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the independence of the country.
					
					 Attending it were the president and high-ranking officials of the parliament, the government and the military and people from different circles and masses of the DR Congo. The ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Kinshasa and Korean technicians were present on invitation. 
					
					 The governor of Kinshasa Province said in his speech at the ceremony that the able Korean technicians wonderfully erected the statue and expressed deep thanks for it.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- A lecture, a reading session and a film show took place in Guinea, Ethiopia and Russia between June 23 and 28 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, at the lecture said that independence ran through the whole life of Kim Il Sung who led to victory the Korean revolution for over seven decades.
					
					 On the basis of this truth, Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea, at the historic Kalun meeting in 1930, he said, adding that the Korean revolution could advance along the road of independence indicated by the Juche idea, the Songun idea since then.
					
					 Medhane, secretary general of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, read out "The Home Base" from Vol. 3 of Part One The Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", the reminiscences of Kim Il Sung, and said that the reminiscences serve as a textbook which the people aspiring after independence should regard as guidelines.
					
					 After watching a Korean film showing the exploits of the President for the liberation of Korea, the deputy director of the Russian Centre for the International Scientific and Technological Bulletins stressed that the Korean people could wage a dynamic struggle against the Japanese aggressors as they were led by Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates a signed article to the 9th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Politics of Our Party Is an Effective Socialist Political Mode".
					 The work, published on July 5, Juche 90 (2001), comprehensively deals with the essential contents and originality of the Songun policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, a brilliant embodiment of President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the army and the military affairs, and the tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The ideas and theories expounded in the work serve as highly important guidelines to be held fast to by the army and people of the DPRK in the showdown with imperialism and the U.S., and the building of a thriving socialist nation, the article notes, proving the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il has provided for steering Korean-style socialism to victory with his Songun policy.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The DPRK is dashing ahead towards a thriving nation after emerging an invincible political and ideological power single-mindedly united around the headquarters of the revolution in which socialism formed a community linked by the same destiny and a socialist fortress with matchless military power and strong national economic potential. This is the brilliant fruition of the Songun policy of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His wise leadership finds a vivid expression in that he built up invincible armed forces capable of beating back any anti-socialist action of the imperialists at a single blow, consolidated the great army-people unity, the strongest weapon of revolution, in every way and brought about great innovations and leap forward in building a thriving nation by giving free rein to the ideological and mental power of all the servicepersons and people.
					
					 The cause of building a thriving socialist power is sure to be crowned with victory as long as there are the army and people giving full play to the single-minded unity, the strong national self-respect, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, the noble love for the future and the spirit of devotion under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza interpretacion de EE.UU. sobre el caso del "Cheonan"
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza interpretacion de EE.UU. sobre el caso del "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos interpreta el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" como una "violacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 6 la siguiente respuesta a la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea:
					Ahora, EE.UU. plantea absurdamente, por conducto de las autoridades surcoreanas, discutir el caso del "Cheonan" en la "Comision Militar de Armisticio" insistiendo en que eso constituye una "violacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio". 
					
					Es un hecho historico conocido por todo el mundo que el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea ha sido violado e invalidado de manera sistematica por EE.UU. desde el momento de su firma. 
					
					EE.UU. lo quebro sistematicamente comenzando por violar sus articulos nucleares como la clausula 60 sobre la convocacion de una reunion politica de un nivel mas alto para discutir los problemas como la retirada de todas las fuerzas extranjeras de Corea y la solucion pacifica del problema coreano y la clausula 13 que prohibe la introduccion de los equipos de operaciones militares de toda indole desde el exterior de Corea. 
					
					En 1991, EE.UU. paralizo totalmente la funcion de la "Comision Militar de Armisticio" al retirar a su miembro decano, que representaba en este aparato la parte de las "Fuerzas de la ONU", colocando unilateralmente en su cargo a un "general" del ejercito titere surcoreano que no fue el signatario del Acuerdo de Armisticio ni formaba parte de las "Fuerzas de la ONU".
					
					Resulta muy absurdo que EE.UU. involucrara en el caso del "Cheonan" el acuerdo y el aparato de armisticio que han sido quebrados por el mismo. 
					
					En esto subyace una siniestra meta.
					
					Se aumentan cada dia mas en el ambito mundial las sospechas del "resultado de investigacion" del Sur de Corea y crecen el consentimiento internacional con la propuesta de la RPDC de enviar un grupo de inspeccion. 
					
					Por eso, con el fin de impedir el envio del grupo de inspeccion de la RPDC y encubrir la verdad de aquel incidente intrigante inventado por si mismos, EE.UU. y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, que se ven en apuro, estan metiendo su marana en cuanto al lugar de debate. Es decir, EE.UU. planteo equivocadamente el "debate en la Comision Militar de Armisticio" aprovechando que la RPDC no reconoce este aparato.
					
					Si bien EE.UU. argumenta su insistencia con el "antecedente" de haber discutido los casos de violacion del Acuerdo de Armisticio en las conversaciones militares a nivel de general RPDC-EE.UU., el incidente de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" no es uno de esos casos y no se ha revelado siquiera su verdad hasta la fecha. 
					
					La posicion de  la RPDC sobre este tema consiste en enviar el grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional para aclarar primero la verdad del caso y sostener un contacto de trabajo con vistas a las conversaciones militares de alto nivel Norte-Sur de Corea. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU debera calar bien lo falso y lo verdadero en el principio de objetividad e imparcialidad y prestar atencion merecida a las propuestas de la RPDC para aclarar de manera consecuente los verdaderos aspectos del caso.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a An Tong Su por 60o aniversario de su caida
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a An Tong Su por 60o aniversario de su caida
						
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la caida del Heroe de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea An Tong Su, tuvo lugar el dia 6 una ceremonia de homenaje ante su tumba en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos.
					Estaba colocada ahi la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Ki Nam, secretario del CC del PTC, Hwang Sun Hui, directora del Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios correspondientes, la compatriota residente en Rusia, Jong Il Sim, quien es esposa del martir, y otra familia.
					
					Fueron depositados las ofrendas florales y ramos de flores en nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, unidades del EPC, el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana y la Direccion de Atencion a los Compatriotas en Extranjero.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de An Tong Su quien cayo heroicamente en la batalla durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.

articles.title: Estatua de bronce del primer presidente de Congo Democratico
articles.content:
Estatua de bronce del primer presidente de Congo Democratico
						
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- Fue erguida la estatua de bronce de Kasavubu, primer presidente de la Republica Democratica del Congo, en cooperacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Tuvo lugar el 29 de junio en Kinshasa la ceremonia de descubrimiento de la estatua del bronce en ocasion del 50o aniversario de la independencia de la RDC.
					
					  En el acto participaron el presidente, cuadros de alto rango del parlamento, el gobierno y el circulo militar, las personalidades de distintos sectores y otros habitantes de este pais africano. Tambien, fueron invitados el embajador y otros miembros de la Embajada de la RPDC acreditados en ese pais y los tecnicos coreanos.
					
					  En su discurso el gobernador de Kinshasa se refirio a que los competentes tecnicos coreanos edificaron excelentemente la citada estatua de bronce y expreso profundo agradecimiento al respecto.

articles.title: EE.UU. no podra amedrentar a Corea de ninguna manera
articles.content:
EE.UU. no podra amedrentar a Corea de ninguna manera
Pyongyang, 6 de julio (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun califica de tonteria la intencion de Estados Unidos de amilanar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con los portaaviones y advierte que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea mostraran el temperamento de la Corea del Songun empleando todas sus fuerzas si los enemigos se atreven a atacarla. 
					  No se puede pasar por alto los imprudentes movimientos militares de EE.UU. que se dan en el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana coincidiendo con el 60o aniversario del estallido de la guerra coreana, senala el comentarista y continua:
					
					  El plan de los imperialistas norteamericanos de trasladar su portaaviones nuclear al Mar Oeste de Corea corrobora que ellos toman el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" como la mejor oportunidad para dar destaque a su presencia y poderio militares. 
					
					  En el trasfondo del plan de EE.UU. de librar ejercicios militares en el Mar Oeste de Corea pretextando bloquear la "infiltracion" de submarinos de la RPDC esta su astuta intencion de presionar y disuadir en lo militar a otras potencias. 
					
					  Los belicistas norteamericanos dicen que en los inminentes ejercicios belicos, el portaaviones "'George Washington' actuara independientemente" y se quedara aun despues de terminado el entrenamiento. 
					
					  Este hecho muestra que EE.UU. considera el caso del "Cheonan" como la oportunidad para aumentar sus fuerzas armadas en la region del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					  A traves del presente simulacro, EE.UU. pretende establecer su dominio militar en el Nordeste Asiatico y controlarlo con la fuerza. 
					
					  Pero, EE.UU. esta equivocado. Los paises asiaticos no observaran con brazos cruzados las maniobras de los imperialistas norteamericanos encaminadas a la toma de hegemonia militar. 
					
					  EE.UU. debe abandonar su vana ilusion de reprimir a otros paises y dominar el mundo con el garrote militar.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun inculpa a EE.UU. de estropear la reunificacion
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun inculpa a EE.UU. de estropear la reunificacion
escollo mas grande que impide la gran marcha de la nacion coreana para lograr la reunificacion de la patria ejecutando la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					EE.UU. es el autor principal que dividio a la nacion coreana y obstaculiza la reunificacion de ella.
					
					Por violar la dignidad nacional y la soberania de los habitantes surcoreanos, suprimir la democracia e instigar a la banda de los titeres surcoreanos a la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra contra la RPDC, EE.UU. devino el enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana que lo odia mas que a nadie. 
					
					Recientemente, los belicistas gringos orquestaron con los titeres surcoreanos la gran farsa anti-RPDC conocida como el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan". Esto es una muestra coherente de su siniestra y peligrosa intencion de bloquear la corriente de la epoca del 15 de Junio, destruir la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y desatar a toda costa la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Sin poner punto final a la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por los imperialistas norteamericanos, su politica hostil a la RPDC y a su intervencion, no se puede resolver de modo independiente y conforme a la demanda y los intereses de la nacion los asuntos nacionales ni el problema de reunificacion de la patria. Esto es la leccion que ha ensenado la historia de division nacional de mas de 60 anos.
					
					Hay que eliminar el factor que obstaculiza la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria mediante una lucha pannacional contra la dominacion y la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y hacer retirarse del Sur de Corea a las tropas norteamericanas para que EE.UU. no tenga pretexto de intervenir en los asuntos internos de la nacion coreana.
